main.name: Elvis Gonzalez
main.description: Techie and Foodie by heart, located in historic Charleston, SC. I am passionate about improving, learning, and teaching code!
main.bio: I love learning new things, teaching others, and sealife! üê¢ My main programming experience is in JavaScript, although I have academic experience in other languages, such as Java and Visual Basic. I am currently working with Atlas Technologies, Inc as a Software Tester. Working for Atlas has given me a flexible opportunity that has allowed me to learn a variety of things in a fairly short amount of time. I am also enrolled into Lambda School, a full stack immersive, in order to fill gaps in my knowledge and stay on top of new and developing technologies!
main.prointerests: JavaScript, React, Node.JS, Express.JS, MongoDB, GIT, Open Source, Python, Scripting, HTML, CSS, SASS/LESS
main.contactmessage: Thanks for checking out my resume!
